title: Remove auto fill from bronze
body:
It just doesnt work.
You are putting players that have no clue how to support.
There is no system to insta ban a role forcing playing who fights and takes top forcing a double top as reporting after the game is stupid because we lost mmr, lp and the game.
I am happy to wait for a real fucking support not this "I'm locking in {{champion:53}}, miss every fucking rocket grab support and feed the enemy adc support".

Just ermove auto fill from bronze.

At least in higher tiers that have some experience with supporting but in bronze it's painfulkl being zoned hard by your support because they have no idea how to position themselves, they don't buy a gold item or even buy a sighstone to ward.

replies.body: Its gonna make queue longer and maybe take away best roles in good bronze players
